main event: A bright white object was observed moving at high speed east of Misawa AFB on July 23, 1951.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately 3 minutes., The object appeared to be about 1 degree in diameter., It left a faint trail as it traveled from horizon to horizon., The object was concluded to likely be a satellite due to its speed and trajectory., The sighting was conducted at dusk, which may have contributed to the visibility of the bright object.
location: East of Misawa AFB, Aomori, Japan
